a.id AS "id", a.je AS "je", a.ckqcbj AS "ckqcbj", a.ckhcbj AS "ckhcbj", a.nub AS "nub", a.supplierid AS "supplier.id", csu.name AS "supplier.name", a.goodsid AS "goods.id", cg.name AS "goods.name", cgcl.name AS "goods.gclass.parent.name", cgc.name AS "goods.gclass.name", cg.tm AS "goods.tm", cg.sort AS "goods.sort",

LEFT JOIN c_goods cg ON a.goodsid=cg.id LEFT JOIN c_gclass cgc ON cgc.id=cg.gclassid LEFT JOIN c_gclass cgcl ON cgcl.id=cgc.parent_id LEFT JOIN c_house ch ON a.housid=ch.id LEFT JOIN c_store cst ON a.storeid=cst.id LEFT JOIN c_supplier csu ON a.supplierid=csu.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON a.jsr=su.id LEFT JOIN c_ddinfo mc on a.ddinfo=mc.id LEFT JOIN c_unit cuna ON cg.`big`=cuna.`id` LEFT JOIN c_unit cunb ON cg.`zong`=cunb.`id` LEFT JOIN c_unit cunc ON cg.`small`=cunc.`id` LEFT JOIN c_spec csp ON cg.`specid`=csp.`id` LEFT JOIN sys_area sao ON sao.id=cst.areaid LEFT JOIN sys_area sat ON sat.id=sao.parent_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_ckinfo( id, je, ckqcbj, ckhcbj, nub, supplierid, goodsid, housid, storeid, ckdate, state, issp, jsr, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{je}, #{ckqcbj}, #{ckhcbj}, #{nub}, #{supplier.id}, #{goods.id}, #{house.id}, #{store.id}, #{ckdate}, #{state}, #{issp}, #{jsr.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
